alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Johns, north central Putnam and east central Clay Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Picolata, or 8 miles south of Green Cove Springs. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central St. Johns, north central Putnam and east central Clay Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. For boaters on or near the St Johns River between Green Cove Springs and Bostwick, move to a safe shelter now! Do not be caught on or near the water. Gusty winds and choppy waves are likely. Make sure all on board are wearing life jackets.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam
